title: USB C AUDIO not working at all. Saying charging via USB. Any 2020 help for a 2xl user?
content: I've reset it, tried every fix from previous years. Litterally any help would be appreciated. Google have said that they will ship me a new 2xl but that requires me wiping mine and sending it in leaving me without a phone. Any suggestions for a fix around the dongle and earbuds not working?
